Text:
LOL thx Dean. yeah it would good to see the ads just out of curiosity. but not all the time.
but then again... which ever is easiest for you.
You do a great job. thank you so much. xx

Nice one, cheers Dean. I like the idea of leaving the ads in. I know we curse them when we're obliged to watch them, but being an ex-pat, I agree with Smartchick, they're interesting out of curiosity.
